attributes.action: Those on benefits who also run cars one or more
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to suggest to the government, that those who are on full time benefits,and also run cars either one or more ,that they  should declare the cars when attending a job centre or any other moneys.
There are Benefit cheats who have more than one car are getting also free TV, electric , water provided by the state in adition to getting there cars taxed and other things by taxpayers.
